items.description: OK, genius. Can you figure out what these funny men's socks mean? They feature a donkey graduate wearing a mortarboard and glasses. That's right ... it's a concept you're really familiar with. It's a smart ass! These hilariously irreverent socks are just right for the man who always has some kind of comeback ready. They're also a perfect gift for graduation!
items.title: Smart Ass Socks
